title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 12 - Consumer Complaint Procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 12 - Consumer Complaint Procedures

State Regulations
§ 12.0 - Applicability of part 12 complaint procedures
§ 12.1 - Complaints and questions
§ 12.2 - Complaint files
§ 12.3 - Continuation of service while a complaint is at the commission
§ 12.4 - Initial decision on complaint
§ 12.5 - Requests for informal hearing or review
§ 12.6 - Description of informal hearings and reviews
§ 12.7 - Rights of parties
§ 12.8 - Powers and duties of hearing officers and reviewers
§ 12.9 - Hearing postponement
§ 12.10 - Failure to appear
§ 12.11 - Settlement agreement
§ 12.12 - Informal hearing or review decision
§ 12.13 - Appeals to the commission
§ 12.14 - Commission determination

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 12

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§ 20, 43[2], 50, 65[1], 66, 67, 79, 80, 89-b, 89-c, 89-d, 91, 94, 96, 98

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
